remarks: Closure of a group sum in a subgroup.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsumsubgcl as of 3-Jun-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumsubgclOLD.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumsubgclOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
gsumsubgclOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumsubgclOLD.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
gsumsubgclOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) $.
gsumsubgclOLD.w $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumsubgclOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) e. S ) $.
